attributes.action: Removal of Adam Smith from English £20 Banknotes
attributes.additional_details: This petition calls for the Bank of England to remove the image of Adam Smith from English £20 notes and replace it with an image of an esteemed Englishman instead.  This is yet another blatant insult to the English nation as no such reciprocal arrangement would ever be accepted north of the border and therefore neither should we the English.
